001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.net.URISyntaxException;
005import java.util.EnumMap;
006import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
007import java.util.Objects;
008import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
009import java.util.function.Supplier;
010
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder.EncoderProvider;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputType;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.format.StandardEventFormatter;
014
015/**
016 * Encoder registry
017 */
018public sealed interface LogEncoderRegistry extends EncoderProvider {
019
020        /**
021         * Registers an encoder by uri scheme.
022         * @param scheme encoder name.
023         * @param encoder loaded encoder
024         */
025        public void register(String scheme, EncoderProvider encoder);
026
027        /**
028         * Associates a default formatter with a specific output type
029         * @param outputType output type to use for finding best default formatter.
030         * @return formatter for output type.
031         */
032        public LogEncoder encoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType);
033
034        /**
035         * Sets a default formatter for a specific output type.
036         * @param outputType output type.
037         * @param formatter formatter.
038         */
039        public void setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder> formatter);
040
041        /**
042         * Creates encoder registry
043         * @return encoder registry
044         */
045        public static LogEncoderRegistry of() {
046                return new DefaultEncoderRegistry();
047        }
048
049}
050
051final class DefaultEncoderRegistry extends ProviderRegistry<LogEncoder.EncoderProvider, LogEncoder, RuntimeException>
052                implements LogEncoderRegistry {
053
054        private static URI normalize(URI uri) {
055                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
056                String path = uri.getPath();
057                try {
058                        if (scheme == null) {
059                                if (path == null) {
060                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is not proper: " + uri);
061                                }
062                                if (path.startsWith("./") || path.startsWith("/")) {
063                                        uri = new URI("name://" + path);
064                                }
065                                else {
066                                        uri = new URI(path + ":///");
067                                }
068                        }
069                }
070                catch (URISyntaxException e) {
071                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is not proper: " + uri);
072                }
073                return uri;
074        }
075
076        @Override
077        public LogEncoder provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) {
078                uri = normalize(uri);
079                /*
080                 * TODO file bug with checker as it should have found scheme to be null.
081                 */
082                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
083                if (scheme == null) {
084                        throw new IllegalStateException("bug. uri was not normalized");
085                }
086
087                var provider = providers.get(scheme);
088                if (provider == null) {
089                        throw new NoSuchElementException("No encoder found. URI=" + uri);
090                }
091                return provider.provide(uri, name, properties);
092        }
093
094        private final ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
095
096        private final EnumMap<OutputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder>> formatters = new EnumMap<>(OutputType.class);
097
098        /**
099         * Associates a default formatter with a specific output type
100         * @param outputType output type to use for finding best default formatter.
101         * @return encoder for output type.
102         */
103        @Override
104        public LogEncoder encoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType) {
105                lock.readLock().lock();
106                try {
107                        var formatter = formatters.get(outputType);
108                        if (formatter == null) {
109                                return LogEncoder.of(StandardEventFormatter.builder().build());
110                        }
111                        return Objects.requireNonNull(formatter.get());
112                }
113                finally {
114                        lock.readLock().unlock();
115                }
116        }
117
118        /**
119         * Sets a default formatter for a specific output type.
120         * @param outputType output type.
121         * @param formatter formatter.
122         */
123        @Override
124        public void setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder> formatter) {
125                lock.writeLock().lock();
126                try {
127                        formatters.put(outputType, formatter);
128                }
129                finally {
130                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
131                }
132        }
133
134}
